3bd57004-f418-488f-9fb4-6f543e11357f.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
3bd57004-f418-488f-9fb4-6f543e11357f.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, Parmesan cheese, pepper
3bd57004-f418-488f-9fb4-6f543e11357f.instructions: Boil pasta. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta off heat.

088e0107-37b1-4838-ab5f-cd9ba1a5619e.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
088e0107-37b1-4838-ab5f-cd9ba1a5619e.ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, tomato sauce, garam masala, garlic, ginger
088e0107-37b1-4838-ab5f-cd9ba1a5619e.instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill until cooked. Simmer sauce, add chicken, serve with rice.

d4c89538-e693-4bc6-ab5d-d09bba637e3a.title: Avocado Toast
d4c89538-e693-4bc6-ab5d-d09bba637e3a.ingredients: Bread, avocado, lemon juice, chili flakes, salt, olive oil
d4c89538-e693-4bc6-ab5d-d09bba637e3a.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon and salt. Spread and top with chili flakes.

77770782-edd7-4483-8ec9-0f4a72f18741.title: Pancakes
77770782-edd7-4483-8ec9-0f4a72f18741.ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder, butter
77770782-edd7-4483-8ec9-0f4a72f18741.instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour batter on hot pan. Flip when bubbles form. Serve with syrup.

28a3508d-b7b4-4b53-bef3-9aa6d2bc85af.title: Caprese Salad
28a3508d-b7b4-4b53-bef3-9aa6d2bc85af.ingredients: Tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
28a3508d-b7b4-4b53-bef3-9aa6d2bc85af.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with basil. Drizzle oil and vinegar. Season.

f5ad9f79-6a8e-44c1-8142-97fa4b5ed038.title: Beef Tacos
f5ad9f79-6a8e-44c1-8142-97fa4b5ed038.ingredients: Tortillas, ground beef, cheese, lettuce, tomato, taco seasoning
f5ad9f79-6a8e-44c1-8142-97fa4b5ed038.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Assemble in tortillas with toppings. Serve hot.

cabc83fc-6482-4413-a8e7-fbf3f3793763.title: Greek Salad
cabc83fc-6482-4413-a8e7-fbf3f3793763.ingredients: Cucumber, tomatoes, feta, olives, red onion, oregano, olive oil
cabc83fc-6482-4413-a8e7-fbf3f3793763.instructions: Chop veggies. Toss with olive oil and herbs. Add feta and serve.

973f404f-95e4-4c30-8d7b-45a55615201e.title: Shrimp Scampi
973f404f-95e4-4c30-8d7b-45a55615201e.ingredients: Shrimp, garlic, butter, white wine, parsley, spaghetti
973f404f-95e4-4c30-8d7b-45a55615201e.instructions: Cook shrimp in butter/garlic. Add wine, toss with pasta and parsley.

f442cc76-7d68-4e5d-87e4-b9b1d5293887.title: Miso Ramen
f442cc76-7d68-4e5d-87e4-b9b1d5293887.ingredients: Ramen noodles, miso paste, pork, scallions, egg, seaweed
f442cc76-7d68-4e5d-87e4-b9b1d5293887.instructions: Simmer broth with miso. Add noodles and toppings. Serve hot.

afbe8d64-99ab-41ef-91c7-d61b8a6313e9.title: Banana Bread
afbe8d64-99ab-41ef-91c7-d61b8a6313e9.ingredients: Bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, butter, baking soda, vanilla
afbe8d64-99ab-41ef-91c7-d61b8a6313e9.instructions: Mash bananas. Mix with other ingredients. Bake at 350Â°F for 60 mins.

a7e1e863-2c9e-4d7d-b951-7d64f73f4c1a.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
a7e1e863-2c9e-4d7d-b951-7d64f73f4c1a.instructions: Butter bread. Place cheese in between. Grill until golden brown.

b99f9839-c1d5-4219-98d1-b3f527fe4f22.title: Caesar Salad
b99f9839-c1d5-4219-98d1-b3f527fe4f22.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan, Caesar dressing
b99f9839-c1d5-4219-98d1-b3f527fe4f22.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons and Parmesan.

c48ea8b2-6455-45a4-b396-43ad2c5fc9ea.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
c48ea8b2-6455-45a4-b396-43ad2c5fc9ea.ingredients: Broccoli, bell peppers, soy sauce, garlic, onions, carrots
c48ea8b2-6455-45a4-b396-43ad2c5fc9ea.instructions: Stir fry vegetables in hot oil. Add sauce. Serve hot with rice.

1a2d3c4e-5f6b-7890-1234-56789abcdef0.title: Mac and Cheese
1a2d3c4e-5f6b-7890-1234-56789abcdef0.ingredients: Macaroni, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, flour
1a2d3c4e-5f6b-7890-1234-56789abcdef0.instructions: Cook pasta. Make cheese sauce. Mix together and bake if desired.

e3b78d18-32a1-4870-bb9e-0900f6a2e865.title: Tomato Soup
e3b78d18-32a1-4870-bb9e-0900f6a2e865.instructions: Simmer tomatoes and aromatics. Blend smooth. Add cream and basil.

438fd4d2-2aa9-4a6b-a8f4-91a69d0c4f52.title: French Toast
438fd4d2-2aa9-4a6b-a8f4-91a69d0c4f52.ingredients: Bread, eggs, milk, cinnamon, vanilla, syrup
438fd4d2-2aa9-4a6b-a8f4-91a69d0c4f52.instructions: Dip bread in egg mix. Fry until golden. Serve with syrup.

591f859e-3603-4c4f-9272-e5ac98e9a5fc.title: Quinoa Bowl
591f859e-3603-4c4f-9272-e5ac98e9a5fc.ingredients: Quinoa, roasted veggies, chickpeas, tahini sauce
591f859e-3603-4c4f-9272-e5ac98e9a5fc.instructions: Cook quinoa. Arrange in bowl with toppings. Drizzle with tahini.

aa9d11bc-9d9d-429e-b243-73aee8f6c1d4.title: Falafel Wrap
aa9d11bc-9d9d-429e-b243-73aee8f6c1d4.ingredients: Falafel, pita bread, lettuce, tomato, hummus, tahini
aa9d11bc-9d9d-429e-b243-73aee8f6c1d4.instructions: Warm pita. Add falafel and toppings. Wrap and serve.

29e51702-b4c3-4b0b-8221-e3b3451871c6.title: Margherita Pizza
29e51702-b4c3-4b0b-8221-e3b3451871c6.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, olive oil
29e51702-b4c3-4b0b-8221-e3b3451871c6.instructions: Top dough with sauce and cheese. Bake and garnish with basil.

47c6e4fb-0402-44e2-9216-7d3a2e3e7336.title: Sushi Rolls
47c6e4fb-0402-44e2-9216-7d3a2e3e7336.ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, fish, cucumber, avocado, soy sauce
47c6e4fb-0402-44e2-9216-7d3a2e3e7336.instructions: Lay nori on mat. Add rice and fillings. Roll, slice, and serve.

836c9ebf-1a82-407e-aaa9-f5b3eebffcbf.title: Stuffed Peppers
836c9ebf-1a82-407e-aaa9-f5b3eebffcbf.ingredients: Bell peppers, rice, ground beef, tomato sauce, cheese
836c9ebf-1a82-407e-aaa9-f5b3eebffcbf.instructions: Stuff peppers with filling. Bake until tender and cheese melts.

3d26ff20-e456-442b-9b5c-b12d6d198d55.title: Egg Fried Rice
3d26ff20-e456-442b-9b5c-b12d6d198d55.ingredients: Rice, eggs, soy sauce, green onions, peas, sesame oil
3d26ff20-e456-442b-9b5c-b12d6d198d55.instructions: Scramble eggs. Stir fry rice and veggies. Mix in soy sauce.

d85a8b70-3b18-41e7-967c-8702bbd5c2c6.title: Chili Con Carne
d85a8b70-3b18-41e7-967c-8702bbd5c2c6.ingredients: Ground beef, beans, tomatoes, chili powder, onions
d85a8b70-3b18-41e7-967c-8702bbd5c2c6.instructions: Brown meat. Add other ingredients. Simmer and serve with rice.

effcc5db-524c-4a3a-9e1d-7cf86c5bc8dc.title: Berry Smoothie
effcc5db-524c-4a3a-9e1d-7cf86c5bc8dc.ingredients: Mixed berries, yogurt, banana, honey, milk
effcc5db-524c-4a3a-9e1d-7cf86c5bc8dc.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

f9c7b88d-7759-4cf1-b74e-1eec6604ec6e.title: BBQ Ribs
f9c7b88d-7759-4cf1-b74e-1eec6604ec6e.ingredients: Pork ribs, BBQ sauce, dry rub, garlic powder, brown sugar
f9c7b88d-7759-4cf1-b74e-1eec6604ec6e.instructions: Rub ribs. Bake low and slow. Finish with BBQ sauce on grill.

da70817d-9e97-47a3-8998-83dcbd05ae10.title: Pumpkin Soup
da70817d-9e97-47a3-8998-83dcbd05ae10.ingredients: Pumpkin, onion, vegetable broth, cream, nutmeg
da70817d-9e97-47a3-8998-83dcbd05ae10.instructions: Cook pumpkin and onions. Blend and add cream. Season.

8c99136b-f899-43a5-80d1-df2d824dd2f5.title: Lentil Curry
8c99136b-f899-43a5-80d1-df2d824dd2f5.ingredients: Lentils, coconut milk, curry powder, onion, garlic
8c99136b-f899-43a5-80d1-df2d824dd2f5.instructions: Simmer lentils with spices and coconut milk. Serve with rice.

74d3e93f-2c68-412e-a8cb-5e2c1f326b2a.title: Chocolate Mousse
74d3e93f-2c68-412e-a8cb-5e2c1f326b2a.instructions: Melt chocolate. Fold in whipped cream and egg whites. Chill.
